incident_updates.body: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Servers in rack 46D23 are operational again. Ongoing Actions : Our team is fixing the remaining servers. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Since 15/07/2025 04:04 UTC, servers in rack 46D23 and 46D25 are temporarily unavailable. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering on the racks 46D20 / 46D21 and 46D22. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 15/07/2025 00:44 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the specified racks are temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located on the specified racks. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 16/07/2025 04:00 UTC End time : 16/07/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : All servers in the rack G111A21 are temporarily unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [RBX/SBG][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer. Start time : 16/07/2025 04:30 UTC End time : 16/07/2025 10:00 UTC Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data. This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements. During the maintenance period, your data will remain available. Thank you for your understanding.

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure. scheduled_maintenances.name: [MUM][Virtual Private Servers] - Network equipment maintenance notification - AP - VPS-1

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure. Start time : 28/07/2025 07:00 UTC End time : 28/07/2025 09:00 UTC Service impact : The network of all VPS located in the region AP-SOUTH-MUM-VPS-1 will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the VPS region SYD. Start time : 28/07/2025 16:00 UTC End time : 28/07/2025 18:00 UTC Service impact : The network of all VPS located in the region SYD will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offering in room W31. Start time : 28/07/2025 18:00 UTC End time : 01/08/2025 02:00 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unreachable on room W31 during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment to improve general performance. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the VPS region SGP. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Virtual Private Servers offer. Start time : 04/07/2025 09:00 UTC End time : 04/08/2025 21:00 UTC Service impact : Below-mentioned images will no longer be available to purchase or use. Several images currently offered as part of our VPS offering have reached, or are approaching, End of Life (EoL). As of August 4th, 2025, these images will be officially removed from our VPS catalog in accordance with our End of Life policy. You can read more about our distribution End of Life policy here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-vps-image-life-cycle?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0050801 Below is the complete list of images, as well our recommendations and alternatives for VPS environments.
EoL DistributionEoL / EoS dateAlternative DistributionRecommended action
Centos 730/06/2024AlmaLinux/ Rocky LinuxBackup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3705/12/2023Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3821/05/2024Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
If you use automation to deploy your infrastructure with any of these images, we strongly recommend that you either switch to another distribution or upload your own image to use instead. You can refer to the following guides to : Upgrade operating system: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upgrade-operating-system?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051306 Upload your image: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upload-own-image?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051319 Service improvement : As part of our End of Life policy, the above-mentioned images will no longer be available for purchase or reinstallation in our VPS offering. For any question, please reach out to our support team. Thank you for your understanding.
